summary: The diff only updates project_state.json with tracking metadata about publishing to the free Caffeine subdomain; it does not include any actual deployment/publishing configuration or code changes needed to make callcraftai.caffeine.xyz serve the live app.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish CallCraftAI to the free Caffeine domain so the subdomain loads the live app instead of the placeholder/draft.
missing_requirements.reason: No implementation/configuration changes related to building, deploying, or linking a published build to the free Caffeine subdomain are present; only project state metadata was modified.
